subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Italian cyclist Michele Gobbi was in a coma yesterday after sustaining severe head injuries in a fall in the GP Beghelli race. The 29-year-old Gobbi, who has four victories in his pro career, was airlifted to a hospital in Bologna, Italy.
snippet: The Italian cyclist Michele Gobbi was in a coma yesterday after sustaining severe head injuries in a fall in the GP Beghelli race. The 29-year-old Gobbi, who has four victories in his pro career, was airlifted to a hospital in Bologna, Italy.
